FuncDef:
The ipv6-flow vpnv6 command enables the BGP-Flow VPNv6 address family and displays its view.
The undo ipv6-flow vpnv6 command deletes the BGP-Flow VPNv6 address family view.
By default, the BGP-Flow VPN6 address family is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
BGP VPNv6 Flow Specification requires that BGP VPNv6 Flow Specification peer relationships be established to transmit BGP VPNv6 Flow Specification routes. BGP VPNv6 Flow Specification peer relationships are established in the BGP-Flow VPNv6 address family view. To enable the BGP-Flow VPNv6 address family and enter its view, run the ipv6-flow vpnv6 command.
Precautions
If the undo ipv6-flow vpnv6 command is run, all configurations in the BGP-Flow VPNv6 address family view are deleted.
